column4: anyone knows how to connect to XP using remote desktop connection from your ubuntu box?
install rdesktop, or do what ASULutzy said. :)
canI be logged on to the XP machine when I log in remotely or will I have to log out first???
forget it, I figured it out, I didnt have a password set on my XP machine, thank you for the 411, rdesktop works like a charm!  :-)
